DataList.LocalizeJP: ブル～アーカイブ～。
DataList.LocalizeEN: Blue~ Archive~

DataList.LocalizeJP:
ふぁあ～…あ、先生～。
せっかくなんだし、のんびり行こうよ～
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Phew... Ah, Sensei~
It's a vacation after all, let's take it slow~

DataList.LocalizeKR:
다들 보기 좋구만.
여유로운 게
제일이지.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
ほほえましい
光景だねぇ…まあ、
余裕があるのは
良いことだ
DataList.LocalizeEN:
It's a heartwarming sight.
It's good for us to spend time like this.

DataList.LocalizeJP:
さーて、どこか横に
なれるところは…
DataList.LocalizeEN: Where can I take a nap now...

DataList.LocalizeJP:
どこか
寛げそうな場所は…
DataList.LocalizeEN: I wonder where I can relax...

DataList.LocalizeJP:
…お、
良さそうだねぇ？
DataList.LocalizeEN: That looks like a good spot?

DataList.LocalizeJP: 何これ…？
DataList.LocalizeEN: What is it...?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
여어-. 왔어? 선생.
괜찮다면 오늘은 좀
느긋하게 보내보자고.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
やぁやぁ先生、お疲れ様ー
今日くらいは
のんびりしない？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Good work, Sensei~
Why don't we take it easy today?

DataList.LocalizeJP: 先生おかえり～。
DataList.LocalizeEN: Welcome back, Sensei~

DataList.LocalizeJP:
…ん、私？
ずーっとここで
休憩してたよー？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Me? I've been resting here all along~?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
설마 이렇게
차려입은 사람에게
뭔가 시키려는 건 아니지?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
まさかこの格好で、
働かせるつもりかー？
なんて
DataList.LocalizeEN: Are you going to make me work in this outfit?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
相変わらず
先生は忙しそうだねぇ
DataList.LocalizeEN: Sensei seems to be busy as usual~

DataList.LocalizeJP: …これを手伝えば良い？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Can I help you with this?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
…응?
쉬고 싶은 거 아니냐고?
그야 그렇지만….
DataList.LocalizeJP:
んー？まあ、確かに
休みたい気持ちは
やまやまだけど…
DataList.LocalizeEN: Hmm? It's true that I really want to rest...

DataList.LocalizeKR:
일하는 걸 보고 있기도
좀 그래서 말이지.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
先生が働いてるのに、
その横で休むのもねぇ？
DataList.LocalizeEN: But I don't want to lie around while your are working?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
疲れたら
いつでも言ってね、先生
DataList.LocalizeEN: Sensei, please tell me whenever you're tired.

DataList.LocalizeJP:
枕代わりに、
この浮き輪とかどう？
DataList.LocalizeEN: How about this float instead of a pillow?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
今日はどんなことが
起きるのかな～？
DataList.LocalizeEN: I wonder what will happen today~?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
생일 축하해, 선생.
뭐 가지고 싶은 거 있어?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
お誕生日おめでとう、先生。
何か欲しいものでもある？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Happy birthday, Sensei.
Do you want something?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
…내가 할 수 있는 거라면,
뭐든 괜찮다고?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
…私にできる範囲なら、
何でも良いけど？
DataList.LocalizeEN: …Anything I can do for you?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
…あ、そっか。
私の誕生日か。
DataList.LocalizeEN: Oh? It's my birthday. Thank you, Sensei...

DataList.LocalizeJP:
ありがとう、先生…
覚えててもらえるのは、
嬉しいことだね。
DataList.LocalizeEN: I'm really happy that you remember my birthday.

DataList.LocalizeJP: うへへ。
DataList.LocalizeEN: Uhehe

DataList.LocalizeJP:
あけましておめでとう、
先生～
DataList.LocalizeEN: Happy New Year, Sensei~

DataList.LocalizeJP:
…今年もたくさん、
楽しいことがあると良いね
DataList.LocalizeEN: I hope this year we will have a lot of fun.

DataList.LocalizeJP:
何か騒がしいと思ったら、
クリスマスか～
DataList.LocalizeEN: I thought someone was making a fuss, but it was Christmas~

DataList.LocalizeKR:
으음….
이 아저씨도
썩 싫지만은 않아.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
ま、おじさんも別に、
この空気は
嫌いじゃないけどね
DataList.LocalizeEN: Well~, this old man doesn't hate Christmas atmosphere,

DataList.LocalizeJP:
ただ、ちょっとこの格好じゃ
外には出られないかなー？
DataList.LocalizeEN: I just don't know if I can go out in this siwmsuit?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
色んな仮装の
人がたくさんだぁ
DataList.LocalizeEN: There are a lot of people in various costumes.

DataList.LocalizeJP: …え、何その視線
DataList.LocalizeEN: Eh... What's with that look?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
이건 그런 의미로
입은 게 아니라고~.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
これは仮装じゃ
ないってば～
DataList.LocalizeEN: This isn't a costume~

DataList.LocalizeKR:
여기까지 해주는 건가…….
정말이지, 이상하다니까 선생님도.
뭐, 괜찮지만……. 
자 그럼 나도 지금보다 더 열심히 해야겠지?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
ここまでしてくれるとか…
ほんと、変わってるねえ先生も。
まぁ良いけど…じゃあ私も、
今まで以上に頑張らないとね？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
You would go this far for me... You're really weird, Sensei.
Well, it's okay...I'll have to work harder than ever, then, won't I?
